name: Greninja
author: Naoki Saito
flavor_text: It appears and vanishes with a ninja’s grace. It toys with its enemies using swift movements, while slicing them with throwing stars of sharpest water.

attacks.name: Shadow Stitching
attacks.effect: Until the end of your opponent’s next turn, each Pokémon your opponent has in play, in his or her hand, and in his or her discard pile has no Abilities. (This includes cards that come into play on that turn.)

attacks.name: Moonlight Slash
attacks.effect: You may return a {W} Energy from this Pokémon to your hand. If you do, this attack does 20 more damage.
